about_me.des: I am a mechanical engineer  interested by all the other fields of Engineering. We never stop growing, so we never should refuse to still learning from other people and from ours own experiences. Therefore, I always try to learn something new everyday of my life!

projects.scsmods: Scsmods is a repo where I share all the mods that I have created for the MAerican Truck Simulator and the American Truck Simulator. This is a personal project in which I use to work as a hobby.
projects.arduino: Arduino is  a project focused on share different codes I have created playing with my arduino board.

career.phd: PhD. Student @ RWTH Aachen University, Germany
career.phd_des: PhD Student and Guest Scientist at Department of Mechanism Theory and Dynamics of Machines (IGM), RWTH Aachen University
career.research2: Research Assistant @ Technological University of Panama
career.research2_des: I worked as Research Assistant in research projects at Technological University of Panama in the department of Design, Analysis and Simulation (L.E.A.D.S).
career.master: Master's Degree in Mechanical Engineering @ Universidad of Seville, Spain
career.master_des: in May 2014, I graduated from The University of Seville, Spain.
career.masterassis: Research Assistant @ University of Seville, Spain
career.masterassis_des: I worked as Research Assistant in research projects at department of Mechanical Engineering of the University of Seville.
career.research: Research Assistant @ Technological University of Panama
career.research_des: I worked as Research Assistant in research projects at Technological University of Panama in the department of Design, Analysis and Simulation (L.E.A.D.S).
career.university: Bechelor's Degree in Mechanical Engineering by Technoloical University of Panama
career.university_des: in February 2010, I graduated from The Technological University of Panama.
career.college: Student Assistant @ Technological University of Panama
career.college_des: I worked as a Student assistant in research projects at Technological University of Panama.
